title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue (in million U.S. dollars), with a total of 8 data points.
Overall Revenue (in million U.S. dollars) has increased over the Year
Revenue (in million U.S. dollars) is slightly constant from 2006 to 2013.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2006 and 2007.
Max Revenue (in million U.S. dollars) about 834.9 was recorded at Year 2011
Min Revenue (in million U.S. dollars) about 639.0 was recorded at Year 2006
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue (in million U.S. dollars), with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2013.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2011.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2006 to 2008.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2009.
